Title: The Day Before He Died
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Joe Fazzio, Morenike Balogun (executive story editor), Abby Ajayi (story editor), Sarah L. Thompson (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Jack Falahee, Aja Naomi King
Plot: The Keating 4 gets help from Analise to devise a new plan when detectives get a break in the investigation of Simon's shooting. Laurel learns new details about the night Wes dies leading to a shocking confrontation.
